entry.title: 2025 Chrysler Pacifica Select
entry.ns0:dealership_name: Napleton Beaver Dam Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram
entry.ns0:dealership_address: 1724 N Spring St., Beaver Dam, WI 53916
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2025 Chrysler Pacifica Select offered in Diamond Black Crystal Pearlcoat will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Quick Order Package 27L

    Safety Sphere ($1,280 value)

    • 360 Surround View Camera System
    • ParkSense Front/rear Park Assist with Stop
    • Parallel and Perpendicular Park Assist with Stop

    Comfort

    • Heated steering wheel - A warm touch. Trying to drive with bulky winter gloves on isn't always easy. Keep your hands warm in cold temperatures so you can ditch the mitts and get a firm grip with this heated steering wheel.

    Convenience

    • Smart device and keyfob engine start control - Phone ahead. Remotely start your vehicle's engine from the key fob or your smart device, ensuring your ride is ready to go when you get in. Now you can stay comfortable inside while your vehicle gets comfortable outside, ,thanks to Smart device and Keyfob engine start control.
    • Power open and close liftgate - On-demand access. When your arms are full of cargo, the last thing you want to do is set it all down just to open the liftgate, then pick it all back up to load it in. By remotely opening and closing, power liftgate lets you skip straight to the loading. It also eliminates the awkward stretch to reach up for the liftgate to close it. Load and go with power open and close liftgate.

    Safety and Security

    • Blind spot warning - Protect your blind side. You checked the mirror, looked over your shoulder and still nearly collided with the car next to you. Blind spot warning alerts you to the presence of a vehicle to your sides or rear so you know if you're about to make an unsafe lane change. Replace fear and uncertainty with confidence and safety with blind spot warning.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Wireless connectivity - Strike the cord. Wireless technology makes it easy to place calls without having to fumble with your phone. It integrates your device with the system inside your vehicle for hands-free access. Keep connected and keep your hands on the wheel with wireless connectivity.
    Other notable features: Napleton Beaver Dam CDJR is proud to serve customers in communities that include Milwaukee, Madison, Green Bay, Kenosha, Racine, Appleton, Waukesha, Oshkosh, Eau Claire, Janesville, West Allis, La Crosse, Sheboygan, Wauwatosa, Fond du Lac, New Berlin, Brookfield, Wausau, Beloit, Greenfield, Manitowoc, Franklin, Oak Creek, West Bend, Sun Prairie, Superior, Stevens Point, Neenah, De Pere, Mequon and Chicagoland area. Give us a call at 920-212-8283 or stop by to test drive or inquire about your new car or truck today! 1724 N Spring St Beaver Dam WI 53916 Napleton Autos Online Pricing Disclaimer New vehicle inventory is offered for sale at the Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP), as set by Stellantis and/or Stellantis Financial Services. Prices labeled as the "Napleton Price" include all eligible dealer discounts and/or manufacturer incentives and do not include taxes, title, license fees, documentation fees, optional equipment, or dealer-installed accessories selected by the customer at the time of purchase. Destination charges may vary by model and are included in the displayed pricing. All pricing is subject to change without notice based on manufacturer program updates, incentive eligibility, or market conditions. Napleton Autos advertises its inventory on this website, www.napleton.autos, as well as on third-party advertising platforms. Pricing is specific to each vehicle, identified by its Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) and dealer stock number. The pricing shown on www.napleton.autos represents the most current and accurate pricing for Napleton Autos. In the event of any discrepancy between this website and any third-party website, the pricing displayed on www.napleton.autos will be considered the most accurate and will supersede all other advertised prices. entry.ns0:dealership_name: Napleton Beaver Dam Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram
entry.ns0:dealership_address: 1724 N Spring St., Beaver Dam, WI 53916
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. No Accidents! One Owner! This 2024 Honda Civic Sedan EX offered in Crystal Black Pearl will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
  • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

Technology and Telematics

  • Smart device mirroring - Smartphone, meet smart car. You can control your device through your vehicle's infotainment system. Smart device mirroring brings together safety and convenience by making it easier to find what you're looking for while keeping your eyes on the road.

entry.title: 2026 Chrysler Pacifica Select
entry.ns0:dealership_name: Napleton Beaver Dam Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram
entry.ns0:dealership_address: 1724 N Spring St., Beaver Dam, WI 53916
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2026 Chrysler Pacifica Select offered in Diamond Black Crystal Pearlcoat will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

S Appearance Package ($1,945 value)

  • Caprice Leatherette with S Logo
  • Anodized Ink Badging
  • Premium Rear Fascia Black
  • Premium Fascia Upper/lower Grille with Black Surround
  • Black Day Light Opening Moldings
  • Black Stow 'N Place Roof Rack
  • S Badge
  • 245/50R20 BSW AS Self-Sealing Tires
  • 20" X 7.5" S-Model Aluminum Wheels Design 1
  • Piano Black Interior Accents

Quick Order Package 27L

    Comfort

    • Heated steering wheel - A warm touch. Trying to drive with bulky winter gloves on isn't always easy. Keep your hands warm in cold temperatures so you can ditch the mitts and get a firm grip with this heated steering wheel.

    Convenience

    • Power open and close liftgate - On-demand access. When your arms are full of cargo, the last thing you want to do is set it all down just to open the liftgate, then pick it all back up to load it in. By remotely opening and closing, power liftgate lets you skip straight to the loading. It also eliminates the awkward stretch to reach up for the liftgate to close it. Load and go with power open and close liftgate.
    • Keyfob engine start control - Get an early start. Remotely start your vehicle's engine from the key fob, ensuring your ride is ready to go when you get in. Now you can stay comfortable inside while your vehicle gets comfortable outside, thanks to Keyfob engine start control.

    Safety and Security

    • Blind spot warning - Protect your blind side. You checked the mirror, looked over your shoulder and still nearly collided with the car next to you. Blind spot warning alerts you to the presence of a vehicle to your sides or rear so you know if you're about to make an unsafe lane change. Replace fear and uncertainty with confidence and safety with blind spot warning.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Wireless connectivity - Strike the cord. Wireless technology makes it easy to place calls without having to fumble with your phone. It integrates your device with the system inside your vehicle for hands-free access. Keep connected and keep your hands on the wheel with wireless connectivity.
    Other notable features: ENGINE: 3.6L V6 24V VVT UPG I W/ESS, TRANSMISSION: 9-SPEED 948TE AUTOMATIC, QUICK ORDER PACKAGE 27L, WHEELS: 20" X 7.5" S-MODEL ALUMINUM DESIGN 1, TIRES: 245/50R20 BSW AS SELF-SEALING, DIAMOND BLACK CRYSTAL PEARLCOAT, BLACK, CAPRICE LEATHERETTE W/S LOGO, S APPEARANCE PACKAGE, BLACK SEATS Napleton Beaver Dam CDJR is proud to serve customers in communities that include Milwaukee, Madison, Green Bay, Kenosha, Racine, Appleton, Waukesha, Oshkosh, Eau Claire, Janesville, West Allis, La Crosse, Sheboygan, Wauwatosa, Fond du Lac, New Berlin, Brookfield, Wausau, Beloit, Greenfield, Manitowoc, Franklin, Oak Creek, West Bend, Sun Prairie, Superior, Stevens Point, Neenah, De Pere, Mequon and Chicagoland area.
